Manages a User Group Membership resource within HuaweiCloud IAM service.

Note: You *must* have admin privileges in your HuaweiCloud cloud to use this resource.


<div><pulumi-examples>

## Example Usage

<div><pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser></div>





<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using Pulumi;
using Huaweicloud = Pulumi.Huaweicloud;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var group1 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.Group("group1", new()
    {
        Description = "This is a test group",
    });

    var user1 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.User("user1", new()
    {
        Enabled = true,
        Password = "password12345!",
    });

    var user2 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.User("user2", new()
    {
        Enabled = true,
        Password = "password12345!",
    });

    var membership1 = new Huaweicloud.Iam.GroupMembership("membership1", new()
    {
        Group = group1.Id,
        Users = new[]
        {
            user1.Id,
            user2.Id,
        },
    });

});
```

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/Iam"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		group1, err := Iam.NewGroup(ctx, "group1", &Iam.GroupArgs{
			Description: pulumi.String("This is a test group"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		user1, err := Iam.NewUser(ctx, "user1", &Iam.UserArgs{
			Enabled:  pulumi.Bool(true),
			Password: pulumi.String("password12345!"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		user2, err := Iam.NewUser(ctx, "user2", &Iam.UserArgs{
			Enabled:  pulumi.Bool(true),
			Password: pulumi.String("password12345!"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = Iam.NewGroupMembership(ctx, "membership1", &Iam.GroupMembershipArgs{
			Group: group1.ID(),
			Users: pulumi.StringArray{
				user1.ID(),
				user2.ID(),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;
import com.pulumi.Pulumi;
import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.Group;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.GroupArgs;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.User;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.UserArgs;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.GroupMembership;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.Iam.GroupMembershipArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var group1 = new Group("group1", GroupArgs.builder()        
            .description("This is a test group")
            .build());

        var user1 = new User("user1", UserArgs.builder()        
            .enabled(true)
            .password("password12345!")
            .build());

        var user2 = new User("user2", UserArgs.builder()        
            .enabled(true)
            .password("password12345!")
            .build());

        var membership1 = new GroupMembership("membership1", GroupMembershipArgs.builder()        
            .group(group1.id())
            .users(            
                user1.id(),
                user2.id())
            .build());

    }
}
```

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_huaweicloud as huaweicloud

group1 = huaweicloud.iam.Group("group1", description="This is a test group")
user1 = huaweicloud.iam.User("user1",
    enabled=True,
    password="password12345!")
user2 = huaweicloud.iam.User("user2",
    enabled=True,
    password="password12345!")
membership1 = huaweicloud.iam.GroupMembership("membership1",
    group=group1.id,
    users=[
        user1.id,
        user2.id,
    ])
```

```typescript
    enabled: true,
```

```yaml
    type: huaweicloud:Iam:User
    properties:

  user2:
    type: huaweicloud:Iam:User
    properties:
      enabled: true
      password: password12345!
  membership1:
    type: huaweicloud:Iam:GroupMembership
    properties:
      group: ${group1.id}
```

## Look up Existing GroupMembership Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing GroupMembership resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
